section.name: Introduction
section.p: This is the third release of DNA. The primary purpose of this release is the replacement of MetaClass with JDK1.5 Annotation framework.

ul.li: Remove MetaClass dependency and replace with dependency on JDK1.5 Annotation framework. This resulted in removal of significant amount of code from the dna-tools project. The code removal included removing all code that processed and validated MetaClass Attributes.
Migrate the ComponentVerifier class from the org.codehaus.dna.tools package to the org.codehaus.dna.impl.verifier package.
Removal of the dna-tools project including the maven plugin as it no contained any code. The MetaClass code was removed and the verifier code was moved to the dna-impl project.
